detail_desc: Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft waffle-knit cotton blend with a zipped pocket on one sleeve.
Round-necked, long-sleeved top in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with adjustable straps that button at the front and ribbed side sections. Kangaroo pocket with appliqués and a print motif, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede with a round metal buckle. Width 6 cm.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short sleeves with ribbed trims.
Wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Thin metal rings in various designs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a turn-down collar, French front and straight hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and V-shaped opening at the front. Small opening with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, and long, wide balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.

Jacket in a jacquard weave with a sheen. Peak lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative press-studs and a zip at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets, a small front pocket with a flap and press-stud, and a detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a cotton-blend with a cable-knit front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey in a straight cut with high slits in the sides.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Sleeveless playsuit in printed cotton jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and small frill trim at the hems.
Rib-knit, shaftless socks in a soft cotton blend.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Satin bomber jacket with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shorts in stretch cotton twill. High waist with tabs and metal D-rings at the front and a concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Relaxed fit with pleats at the top of the front and side pockets.
Sleeveless dress in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Knee-length, pleated dress with a rounded neckline, opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Flared leggings in jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the hems.
Boots in waterproof imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, patterned weave with a stand-up collar that ties at one side and covered buttons on one shoulder. Lined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Belt in regenerated leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders, short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
One-shoulder blouse in a spotted jacquard weave with one long sleeve. Frill trim at the top that continues right down the sleeve and a concealed zip in one side.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft pima cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a print motif and sequins.
Short jersey top with a round neckline, short sleeves and an open back with ties at the hem.
Blouse in a cool viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in soft fleece with a high collar, zip down the front and a yoke in woven fabric. Side pockets, a zipped chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a glittery elastic waistband and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves that have a gathered seam at the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend.
Long-sleeved jersey top.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and legs and press-stud fasteners.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in soft, washed, organic cotton denim with an elasticated waist, fly with decorative buttons, and side pockets.

Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped sleeve pocket, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 0.8 cm to 1.5 cm.
Wide, straight-cut leather tunic with an opening at the top, dropped shoulders and balloon sleeves with cuffs. High slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Large, elasticated scrunchie.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Short skirt in a recycled wool and recycled polyester weave with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Platform sandals in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 4 cm, heel 13.5 cm.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in mesh with press-studs down the front and a print motif on the chest.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Narrow belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.

Off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Airy jersey underskirt.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck jumper in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, high-waisted skirt in suede with decorative seams. Visible zip and a concealed button at the back. Lined.
Hi-top trainers in canvas with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, and a fake fly.
Short jersey dress with a small gathered collar and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves. Unlined.
Short, fine-knit socks designed to be hidden by your shoes with a silicone trim at the back of the heel to keep them in place.
Imitation suede Captain’s cap. Lined.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Dress in patterned viscose twill with a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck and a yoke at the front with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and hem to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
Lace top with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Cargo trousers in cotton twill with side pockets, back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Zip fly and button, and slim, tapered legs.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a loose, textured, soft cotton knit with a button at the neckline and ribbed flounce over each shoulder.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Knitted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Soft, thermal fleece inside.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a crescent moon, and a trigger clasp. Adjustable length 48-57 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a slightly wider, ribbed neckline, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a wider neckline, print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Dungarees in washed stretch twill with worn details, adjustable straps and a pocket at the top. Side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs with cut-off hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
String body in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a button placket.
Cold shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with lace shoulder straps and long sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey with a super-voluminous skirt in four layers of tulle. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a shimmering tone-on-tone elastic trim at the waist.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print. Press-studs on one shoulder in sizes 0-12 months.
Full-length, sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric hem. Satin lining.
Gently flared, sleeveless top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathers at the top and narrow shoulder straps with tie details.
Long-sleeved top in a soft, rib knit with a low neckline and button placket.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a text print on the front, racer back and cut-out section at the back.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons down the front and scalloped edges.
Body in jersey crêpe and microfibre with short sleeves and an open back with a knot detail. Laser-cut edges at the bottom and press-studs at the crotch.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons at the front.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Fitted tube top in soft cotton jersey.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with pleats at the top and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
A-line dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and cap sleeves. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a small opening at the back. High waist, lined gusset and a string back.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop straps across the foot. Suede linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a stand-up collar and low dropped shoulders.
Short skirt in grained imitation leather with a regular waist, zip at the back and short slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline with pleats  and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with unlined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide elastic trim at the hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Slip-on trainers in fabric with a decorative bow at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton pointelle jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, moss-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a round neck, elasticated seam at the waist and wrapover back with a cut-out section. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with terry appliqués, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with quilted sections, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with a boat neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with metal buttons.
Suede ballet pumps with a bow on the front and an elastic strap over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and textured soles.
Calf-length, flared skirt in sturdy, heavily draping jersey with an elasticated waist and slits in the sides. Lined.

Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with beaded embroidery and sequins at the top. Small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Elasticated hairband in soft cotton jersey with bendy ears.
KELZUKI x H&M. Padded jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Short skirt in velour with reversible sequins. High waist with concealed elastication. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Slim-fit trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and one inner pocket. Lined. Size 6x17x21 cm.
Calf-length, transparent skirt in narrow-pleated mesh with covered elastication at the waist and a raw edge at the top. Contrasting colour lining.

Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Oversized biker jacket in imitation leather with a faux fur collar and lining. Diagonal zip down the front, zipped front pockets and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the hem.

Fleece-lined mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Reflective details and an elasticated strap with a press-stud at the wrists, and narrow elastication around the tops. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. One long-sleeved and one short-sleeved printed top. One pair of long bottoms and one pair of shorts, both with an elasticated waist.
Wide pull-on trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave. Regular waist with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt at the front and elastication at the back, and side pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal decoration and press-stud. Zip fly, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a patterned weave with elastication at the top and an opening with twisted ties at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in textured chiffon with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless romper suit in ribbed, patterned, organic cotton jersey. Wide shoulder straps with button fastenings, patch front pockets and wide fold-up ribbing at the hems. Lined at the top.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, wide pleats at the top, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped hem. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a drawstring hood, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. Round-necked top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in a printed cotton weave with a collar, zip down the front and welt front pockets. Covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Soft leather and suede pouch with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Twill lining. Size 15x22 cm.
Metal and acetate hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of a cobweb with a spider in the centre. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Boleros in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped sparkly stone button at the top.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a hood with a wide, fine-knit drawstring.

Softly draping, calf-length skirt in airy chiffon with a shimmering metallic jacquard pattern. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and an asymmetric hem that is longer at the sides. Slits in the sides. Chiffon underskirt.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck with a gathered seam down the front for a draped effect and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Short dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.
Fitted maxi dress in a rib-knit cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sweetheart neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide lightly padded shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.
Long-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover and V-neck opening at the front. Seam under the bust and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and elastication at the hem.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.
Fitted jumper in a rib knit with a stand-up collar, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button and detachable belt with a large, covered buckle. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Oversized shirt in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, covered buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pockets and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Sandals in imitation leather with decorative appliqués, a tab with a hook and loop fastening, and rubber soles.

Studio Collection. Flared trousers in heavy jersey containing glittery metallic threads. Fitted at the top with a regular waist and tailored waistband with a safety button.
